DOC.brief_title: Three-Year Clinical Evaluation Class II Posterior Composite Restorations
DOC.detailed_description: Forty-seven pair Class II ( mesio-occlusal disto-occlusal ) composite restoration place 37 patient . In cavity , Adper Single Bond 2 use . In one cavity pair , conventional flowable composite , Aelite Flo , apply approximately 2mm thick , remain cavity restore incrementally GrandioSO . In second cavity , bulk-fill flowable composite , x-tra base , apply approximately 4 mm thick bulk increment remain 2mm occlusal part cavity restore GrandioSO . All cavity restore open-sandwich technique operator . At baseline 6-month , 1- , 2- 3-year follow-up visit , restoration evaluate Modified USPHS criterion .
DOC.criteria: Permanent premolar molar without restoration include study . Every tooth include study neighbor teeth occlusion antagonistic teeth . Patients exclude need indirect restoration due significant loss tooth structure , know allergy product ingredient , poor oral hygiene history bruxism .
